00048 class btRotationalLimitMotor
00049 {
00050 public:
00053     btScalar m_loLimit;
00054     btScalar m_hiLimit;
00055     btScalar m_targetVelocity;
00056     btScalar m_maxMotorForce;
00057     btScalar m_maxLimitForce;
00058     btScalar m_damping;
00059     btScalar m_limitSoftness;
00060     btScalar m_normalCFM;
00061     btScalar m_stopERP;
00062     btScalar m_stopCFM;
00063     btScalar m_bounce;
00064     bool m_enableMotor;
00065 
00067 
00070     btScalar m_currentLimitError;
00071     btScalar m_currentPosition;     
00072     int m_currentLimit;
00073     btScalar m_accumulatedImpulse;
00075 
00076     btRotationalLimitMotor()
00077     {
00078         m_accumulatedImpulse = 0.f;
00079         m_targetVelocity = 0;
00080         m_maxMotorForce = 0.1f;
00081         m_maxLimitForce = 300.0f;
00082         m_loLimit = 1.0f;
00083         m_hiLimit = -1.0f;
00084                 m_normalCFM = 0.f;
00085                 m_stopERP = 0.2f;
00086                 m_stopCFM = 0.f;
00087         m_bounce = 0.0f;
00088         m_damping = 1.0f;
00089         m_limitSoftness = 0.5f;
00090         m_currentLimit = 0;
00091         m_currentLimitError = 0;
00092         m_enableMotor = false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     btRotationalLimitMotor(const btRotationalLimitMotor & limot)
00096     {
00097         m_targetVelocity = limot.m_targetVelocity;
00098         m_maxMotorForce = limot.m_maxMotorForce;
00099         m_limitSoftness = limot.m_limitSoftness;
00100         m_loLimit = limot.m_loLimit;
00101         m_hiLimit = limot.m_hiLimit;
00102                 m_normalCFM = limot.m_normalCFM;
00103                 m_stopERP = limot.m_stopERP;
00104                 m_stopCFM =     limot.m_stopCFM;
00105         m_bounce = limot.m_bounce;
00106         m_currentLimit = limot.m_currentLimit;
00107         m_currentLimitError = limot.m_currentLimitError;
00108         m_enableMotor = limot.m_enableMotor;
00109     }
00110 
00111 
00112 
00114     bool isLimited() const
00115     {
00116         if(m_loLimit > m_hiLimit) return false;
00117         return true;
00118     }
00119 
00121     bool needApplyTorques() const
00122     {
00123         if(m_currentLimit == 0 && m_enableMotor == false) return false;
00124         return true;
00125     }

00140 class btTranslationalLimitMotor
00141 {
00142 public:
00143         btVector3 m_lowerLimit;
00144     btVector3 m_upperLimit;
00145     btVector3 m_accumulatedImpulse;
00148     btScalar    m_limitSoftness;
00149     btScalar    m_damping;
00150     btScalar    m_restitution;
00151         btVector3       m_normalCFM;
00152     btVector3   m_stopERP;
00153         btVector3       m_stopCFM;
00154 
00155         bool            m_enableMotor[3];
00156     btVector3   m_targetVelocity;
00157     btVector3   m_maxMotorForce;
00158     btVector3   m_currentLimitError;
00159     btVector3   m_currentLinearDiff;
00160     int                 m_currentLimit[3];
00161 
00162     btTranslationalLimitMotor()
00163     {
00164         m_lowerLimit.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00165         m_upperLimit.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00166         m_accumulatedImpulse.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00167                 m_normalCFM.setValue(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00168                 m_stopERP.setValue(0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f);
00169                 m_stopCFM.setValue(0.f, 0.f, 0.f);
00170 
00171         m_limitSoftness = 0.7f;
00172         m_damping = btScalar(1.0f);
00173         m_restitution = btScalar(0.5f);
00174                 for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) 
00175                 {
00176                         m_enableMotor[i] = false;
00177                         m_targetVelocity[i] = btScalar(0.f);
00178                         m_maxMotorForce[i] = btScalar(0.f);
00179                 }
00180     }
00181 
00182     btTranslationalLimitMotor(const btTranslationalLimitMotor & other )
00183     {
00184         m_lowerLimit = other.m_lowerLimit;
00185         m_upperLimit = other.m_upperLimit;
00186         m_accumulatedImpulse = other.m_accumulatedImpulse;
00187 
00188         m_limitSoftness = other.m_limitSoftness ;
00189         m_damping = other.m_damping;
00190         m_restitution = other.m_restitution;
00191                 m_normalCFM = other.m_normalCFM;
00192                 m_stopERP = other.m_stopERP;
00193                 m_stopCFM = other.m_stopCFM;
00194 
00195                 for(int i=0; i < 3; i++) 
00196                 {
00197                         m_enableMotor[i] = other.m_enableMotor[i];
00198                         m_targetVelocity[i] = other.m_targetVelocity[i];
00199                         m_maxMotorForce[i] = other.m_maxMotorForce[i];
00200                 }
00201     }
00202 
00204 
00210     inline bool isLimited(int limitIndex) const
00211     {
00212        return (m_upperLimit[limitIndex] >= m_lowerLimit[limitIndex]);
00213     }
00214     inline bool needApplyForce(int limitIndex) const
00215     {
00216         if(m_currentLimit[limitIndex] == 0 && m_enableMotor[limitIndex] == false) return false;
00217         return true;
00218     }
00219         int testLimitValue(int limitIndex, btScalar test_value);

00511     //first 3 are linear, next 3 are angular
00512     void setLimit(int axis, btScalar lo, btScalar hi)
00513     {
00514         if(axis<3)
00515         {
00516                 m_linearLimits.m_lowerLimit[axis] = lo;
00517                 m_linearLimits.m_upperLimit[axis] = hi;
00518         }
00519         else
00520         {
00521                         lo = btNormalizeAngle(lo);
00522                         hi = btNormalizeAngle(hi);
00523                 m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_loLimit = lo;
00524                 m_angularLimits[axis-3].m_hiLimit = hi;
00525         }
00526     }
00527 
00529 
00535     bool        isLimited(int limitIndex) const
00536     {
00537         if(limitIndex<3)
00538         {
00539                         return m_linearLimits.isLimited(limitIndex);
00540 
00541         }
00542         return m_angularLimits[limitIndex-3].isLimited();
00543     }

00580 struct btGeneric6DofConstraintData
00581 {
00582         btTypedConstraintData   m_typeConstraintData;
00583         btTransformFloatData m_rbAFrame; // constraint axii. Assumes z is hinge axis.
00584         btTransformFloatData m_rbBFrame;
00585         
00586         btVector3FloatData      m_linearUpperLimit;
00587         btVector3FloatData      m_linearLowerLimit;
00588 
00589         btVector3FloatData      m_angularUpperLimit;
00590         btVector3FloatData      m_angularLowerLimit;
00591         
00592         int     m_useLinearReferenceFrameA;
00593         int m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame;
00594 };
00595 
00596 struct btGeneric6DofConstraintDoubleData2
00597 {
00598         btTypedConstraintDoubleData     m_typeConstraintData;
00599         btTransformDoubleData m_rbAFrame; // constraint axii. Assumes z is hinge axis.
00600         btTransformDoubleData m_rbBFrame;
00601         
00602         btVector3DoubleData     m_linearUpperLimit;
00603         btVector3DoubleData     m_linearLowerLimit;
00604 
00605         btVector3DoubleData     m_angularUpperLimit;
00606         btVector3DoubleData     m_angularLowerLimit;
00607         
00608         int     m_useLinearReferenceFrameA;
00609         int m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame;
00610 };
00611 
00612 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       int     btGeneric6DofConstraint::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
00613 {
00614         return sizeof(btGeneric6DofConstraintData2);
00615 }
00616 
00618 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       const char*     btGeneric6DofConstraint::serialize(void* dataBuffer, btSerializer* serializer) const
00619 {
00620 
00621         btGeneric6DofConstraintData2* dof = (btGeneric6DofConstraintData2*)dataBuffer;
00622         btTypedConstraint::serialize(&dof->m_typeConstraintData,serializer);
00623 
00624         m_frameInA.serialize(dof->m_rbAFrame);
00625         m_frameInB.serialize(dof->m_rbBFrame);
00626 
00627                 
00628         int i;
00629         for (i=0;i<3;i++)
00630         {
00631                 dof->m_angularLowerLimit.m_floats[i] =  m_angularLimits[i].m_loLimit;
00632                 dof->m_angularUpperLimit.m_floats[i] =  m_angularLimits[i].m_hiLimit;
00633                 dof->m_linearLowerLimit.m_floats[i] = m_linearLimits.m_lowerLimit[i];
00634                 dof->m_linearUpperLimit.m_floats[i] = m_linearLimits.m_upperLimit[i];
00635         }
00636         
00637         dof->m_useLinearReferenceFrameA = m_useLinearReferenceFrameA? 1 : 0;
00638         dof->m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame = m_useOffsetForConstraintFrame ? 1 : 0;
00639 
00640         return btGeneric6DofConstraintDataName;
00641 }
